summary: Completed comprehensive testing of XSELL system's three main functionalities: P1 (Orçamentos), P2 (Notificações), and P3 (Controle de acesso). Backend API functionality is excellent (100% success rate). Frontend loads correctly with all required features working perfectly. All P1, P2, and P3 requirements from the review request are functional.

minor_issues.issue: Some 520 server errors in console logs during navigation
minor_issues.impact: Does not affect functionality, likely temporary server issues

passed_tests: User authentication with test@xsell.com credentials
P1: Create new orçamento with automatic numbering (ORC-2025-XXXX format)
P1: Multiple products addition to orçamento with image attachment support
P1: Edit existing orçamento functionality
P1: Convert orçamento to pedido successfully
P1: Get all orçamentos and find created ones in list
P1: Novo Orçamento button clickable and dialog opens/closes
P2: Create expenses with different due dates
P2: Get expenses near expiration endpoint (/api/notificacoes/despesas-vencimento)
P2: Alert card appears in Financeiro when expenses are due
P2: Email notification configuration with correct destination (pauloconsultordenegocios@gmail.com)
P2: Email sending endpoint processes expenses correctly
P2: Email notification button present and functional in UI
P3: /api/vendedores/me endpoint returns correct user level (test@xsell.com NOT president)
P3: Non-president user gets 403 when trying to create vendedor
P3: Non-president user gets 403 when trying to edit vendedor
P3: Vendedores list accessible for read-only access
P3: 'Acesso Restrito' message displayed for non-president users
P3: 'Novo Vendedor' button correctly hidden for non-president users
Frontend navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Orçamentos, Financeiro, Vendedores)
Orçamentos page loads with existing data and proper numbering format
Financeiro page shows saldo card and notification features
Vendedores page shows access control restrictions properly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all P1, P2, P3 features working perfectly)
